name: ARES - Final Release
description:
Builds Uploaded: HTML5, Windows Desktop, and Mac OS.

GamePlay Instructions: WASD to move in different directions:

W/  ^ up,   A < left,  S v down,  D ^ up

  • Hack and slash gameplay with fantasy elements
  • Parry attacks to build up ranged attacks
  • Magic can be used for ranged attacks
  • Posture/ Blocking Mechanics

Main Menu Screen: Press play to begin with the forest level or go to Tutorial and Levels screen. Guides the player to the right direction.

Tutorial Screen: Shows the player the buttons needed to play the game.

Levels Screen: displays three different for the player to pick. The levels are forest, ice, and magma (boss) levels.

Game Overview & Objective:  Hack and slash adventure game to slay enemies, pickup coins and new weapons, and prepare to fight the reaper that took your village. 

The game is still in Alpha process and in development. The objective is essentially to survive, kill all the enemies on each level, and eventually face a boss who will be more difficult to get rid off. We are also thinking of expanding the game in the future as it has quite a lot of potential.

Slash, dash, and parry towards victory!
